channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Phone

item.title: CVE-2023-42545|2024-09-17T13:32:33.996Z -- samsung%20mobile -- phone
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in Phone prior to versions 12.7.20.12 in Android 11, 13.1.48, 13.5.28 in Android 12, and 14.7.38 in Android 13 allows attackers to access location data.
